recipes.name: bepis
recipes.directions: Pour test juice into milk and sprinkle powder to taste.

recipes.name: Kelp Juice
recipes.desc: A serious drink for serious people.
recipes.directions: Blend kelp with water. Let mixture rest for 10 hours then pour into garbage. Garnish with whole oranges.

recipes.name: Flat White
recipes.desc: An espresso based coffee drink prepared by pouring microfoam into a single or double shot of espresso.
recipes.directions: Pre-heat a 6-ounce cup before starting. Pull a single or double shot of espresso directly into the cup. Steam the milk to a warm temperature in a pitcher, swirling to break up large bubbles. Pour the steamed milk into the espresso in a single spot. Lift the pitcher while pouring to better mix the milk and espresso. Serve immediately.
